name: Zera
tagline: AI-powered smart contract auditing with on-chain transparency
description: Zera is an all-in-one solution for smart contract security. It enables AI-powered contract generation, documentation generation, test generation, and auditing report creation. Zera audits contracts across multiple chains using LLMs, and securely registers results on-chain with integrations like Filecoin, ZK, and other Web3 tools for complete decentralized transparency.
